content.query:
-- type your sql script here, we now have intellisense

select * from sparkdb1.dbo.employee

select * from dbo.externalorgdetails

select 
    org, 
    count(*) as OrgHeadCount, 
    COUNT(o.OrgLocation)
From dbo.employee as e
join dbo.externalorgdetails as o
    on e.org=o.OrgName
group by 
    e.org
order by 
    OrgHeadCount
